title: Employees Ask Facebook to Reverse Policy on Political-Ad Fact Checking
text:
A group of Facebook Inc. employees asked the company to reverse its policy of exempting political candidates’ ads from its own fact-checking program, calling the controversial rules a betrayal of the social-media giant’s values.

“Free speech and paid speech are not the same thing,” the employees said in an open letter to Facebook, which was posted on the company’s internal network.
